```{r echo=FALSE}
library(rgl)
library(rglwidget)
dataid <- plot3d(matrix(rnorm(300), ncol=3))["data"]
planeid = planes3d(1,2,3, 4, col="red")
rglwidget(elementId = "testID")
playwidget("testID", controls = propertyControl(values=0:10, entries = 0, properties = "normals", objids = planeid),
                       reinit = planeid,
           start = 0, stop=10, step=0.1)
```
